=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Rubber Sectioning Hair Clips | Narrow-Tipped Design | For Parting & Sectioning Hair | Easy Grip Handles | Professional Styling Results | 6-Pack (Blush)
Review Date: 2022/08/10
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.71 x 1.14 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2323', 'UPC': '810108190585', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Review Text: These clips work great for sectioning hair for highlights. I also use them to hold hair above each slice I weave to keep hair nice and clean while applying bleach. These work really well!
Review Title: Great clips

reference_summary:
MRTREUP 5Pcs Hair Brushes for Women, Hair Comb for Women and Detangling Paddle Brush with Mist Spray Bottle for Wet or Dry Hair, Rail Tail Comb Set for Straight Long Thick Curly Natural Hair
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Color': '5 Pack Muti-purpose Hair Brush Set', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheenDetangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheen   See more', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.92 x 2.56 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MRTREUP'}
Nice set of brushes and combs. And the spray bottle is nice but to my surprise as I squeezed the trigger it already had some sort of liquid in it. I'm not sure if that's from the company testing it or what. But to me that is strange when you receive a new product. However, the spray bottle does work well.
Spray bottle already had liquid in it.
YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party)
YouClean

{'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)  See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'}
These were so fun to wash hands with. The first few went down the sink. My kid had to learn to wet the opposite hand you held the soap in. It suds up really well and smells great! Taking these to the beach for the showers. Love!
So fun to use!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has broadened their interests to include eyelash extension kits, while continuing to seek high-quality hair care tools and accessories. They consistently value multifunctional, ergonomic items that enhance their beauty routines, with an emphasis on quality in both hair and lash products.
- **Experience Sensitivity:** They prefer clean, functional, and eco-friendly products, showing a sensitivity to packaging changes that reflect sustainability. Sturdy design is crucial, as they prioritize usability in hair and eye care tools alike.
- **Rating Behavior:** They frequently leave positive reviews that highlight quality and functionality. Their latest review illustrates a tendency to appreciate effective solutions that simplify personal care, showcasing a balanced perspective that acknowledges minor concerns while emphasizing satisfaction.
- **Functional Needs:** The user looks for features that enhance comfort during use, promote a polished appearance, and accommodate diverse hair and lash types. Recent purchases illustrate a desire for user-friendly products that streamline at-home grooming.
- **Purchase Context:** They actively obtain items that improve their personal grooming routines, reinforcing their commitment to health, hygiene, and aesthetics.
- **Consumer Attitude:** The user maintains a discerning yet optimistic approach to product evaluation, mixing enjoyment with effectiveness in their beauty and self-care practices. Overall, their profile reflects a strong inclination towards high-quality, functional beauty products, alongside a concern for sustainability and performance in both hair and lash care.
